thread.section_title: Merchant Capital Source Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Merchant Capital Source | merchantcapitalsource.com
thread.title: Brian C
thread.title_full: Merchant Capital Source reviewed by Brian C

author: Brian C
title: Brian C
text: This is an awesome company to work with and will bend over backwards. They will help you in all kinds of situations and even help in the problem solving process. They will let you know when there is a problem with your account and will help you identify it to correct it. This is an all around legitimate business and I would highly recommend to other business owners who are looking for extra capital.
